options.option-description: A single column that spans the standard width grid.

options.option-heading: Single main column with offsetted secondary columns
options.option-description: Additional columns may be offset on either side of the standard width grid on larger width displays.
An additional side column on medium to larger displays provides an option for secondary content such as an aside.

options.option-heading: Main column with empty side column
options.option-description: Grid elements can be removed from a grid without affecting the layout of the other elements. In this example the side column has been left out to retain the width of the main column.

options.option-heading: Main column with side column and offsetted secondary columns
options.option-description: This example demonstrates the placement of the offsetted columns is only affected by their order on small width displays.
